name: Just A Boss's Robot
description:
Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019 Submission

Humans are invading your ship! Play as a robotic vacuum cleaner, whose unappreciated job is to clean the ship, and keep the  death traps ship's infrastructure in working order.  Let the ship get too messy, and it's game over.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys

Theme: Based on the "Wrenches 101" theme. The idea was to make a game from the point of view of a tool-like character, instead of the main character, which evolved into playing as a vacuuming robot. 

Achievements: Ultimate Idle, Tango
